/* Wealth of Nations */ Added correct reference to Herbert Stein article in WSJ
/* Wealth of Nations */ Almost all, if not all, notable economists agree that Smith supported a progressive tax. If you can find an economist who believes Smith supported a flat tax, find a link.
/* Wealth of Nations */ a tax in proportion to revenue is a proportional tax or a flat tax, not a progressive tax
RV it's not really rarely-quoted, and it's important because it shows how Adam Smith was one of the first to support progressive taxation
/* Wealth of Nations */ if it's rarely quoted, it's not notable (on behalf of anon who couldn't edit himself)
